name: WashWash
description:
Oh no! Your hands have become incredibly dirty from doing █████████ and you'll have to take care of the █████████ to continue your work.

Unfortunatly your highly trained legs will not help you in this situation. You have to rely on your delicate arms instead which have not seen a workout in years. 
Watch out and keep your distance from unexpected hazards with those slipperly hands of yours!

Just wash your hands... it's that simple!

Game created by:
János Weyhknecht
Thomas-Chase Scheffel
Marco Serrao
Philipp Stenger
Marvin Spahn 
Nora Al-Shamery
